document_data.name: Sparkling Sword
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sparkling sword''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Arvoreen]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this caster's melee weapon, often a [[sword]], began to glow with a sparkling silvery light. The spell increased the damage inflicted by the sword. When the spell expired, the sword was usually ruined. A stronger version of this spell was called ''[[blazing sword]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]] a small amount of [[sulfur]]. The sulfur was tossed onto the weapon during casting.
